query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT0062 SELECT MANDT , CAST(#KUNNR# AS CHAR(10)) AS KUNNR , CAST(#INELN# AS CHAR(11)) AS INELN , CAST(#INSEQ# AS CHAR(3)) AS INSEQ , CAST(#POSNR# AS CHAR(6)) AS POSNR , S62.CHARAC AS CHARAC , CAST(#GBN# AS CHAR(2)) AS ZGUBUN , S62.VALUE AS VALUE , SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8) AS ERDAT , SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),9,6) AS ERZZT , CAST(#G_USER_NAME# AS CHAR(12)) AS ERNAM , SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8) AS AEDAT , SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),9,6) AS AEZZT , CAST(#G_USER_NAME# AS CHAR(12)) AS AENAM FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0062 AS S62 WHERE S62.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND S62.KUNNR = #OKUNNR# AND S62.INELN = #OINELN# AND S62.INSEQ = #OINSEQ# AND S62.POSNR = #OPOSNR#
